settings.board.autoPromotionDesc: Automatically promote to a queen when a pawn reaches the last rank
settings.board.autoSaveDesc: Auto save to file after each move

settings.board.scrollThroughMovesDesc: Enable or disable scrolling through moves on the chessboard

settings.inputs.spellCheckDesc: Enable or disable spell check on text inputs
settings.openingReport.title: Opening Report
settings.openingReport.percentCoverageDe: Percentage of moves covered in each position
settings.openingReport.minGamesDesc: Minimum number of games in each position for it to be considered
settings.anarchy.title: Anarchy
